Solutions

  • Media context

    - appeal to the audience based on search queries. The advertising message is generated individually based on the contextual request.

  • LAL targeting

    — appeal to a segment (look-a-like) of a similar audience of the advertiser's resource, built on the basis of audience data (social demographic, geo, interests, behavior, etc.).

  • Content targeting

    - appeal to the audience on advertising platforms with certain content.

  • Dynamic Retargeting

    - appeal to the audience that visited the advertiser's resource, but did not complete the target action (purchase, order, registration). The advertising message is generated individually based on the visitor's previous behavior on the site.

  • Promo retargeting

    - appeal to a specific audience of the advertiser's resource, for example, visitors who have made purchases or visitors to a category of goods.

  • Promo CRM

    — appeal to the advertiser's CRM audience. Input data can be email addresses, phone numbers, user device ids.

Sales funnel based advertising display solutions

What do you need to get started?

Logo and/or brand book. Promotions, USP, sources for creating banners.an update.)

Link to the catalog of goods / services (*If you do not have a catalog of offers, then we can prepare it on our side.)

Setting codes according to the terms of reference. (*If you have implemented GTM on your site, then we can install the codes ourselves, you only need to publish an update.)

Accommodation price includes:

Media planning: selection of effective sources, elimination of intersections with current placements.

Provision of terms of reference with codes, step-by-step description of integration, examples; requirements and recommendations for the product catalog (XML, YML)

Development and updating of creatives before and during the advertising campaign

Technical monitoring and optimization of the campaign for the client's goals

"We bring an average of 5% to the advertiser's turnover, while not going beyond the established KPI"
